Under the leadership of Eric Schmidt , Google has branched into several new markets such as mobile devices with its Android operating system and the enterprise market with Google Apps. The company certainly hasn't been resting on its laurels, said Davis. During his time at the company, Eric Schmidt has amassed 9.2 million Google shares, worth$ 5.8 bn. In his new role Eric Schmidt will focus on deals, partnerships, customers

April 4, Google announced in an earnings release that the New York Times reported easily beat Wall Street's expectations. Google announced that Eric Schmidt will serve as executive chairman, advising Page and Google co-founder Sergey Brin and concentrating on deals, partnerships, customers, and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership. In a short piece for Harvard Business Review, Eric Schmidt said Google's strategic initiatives are ''all about mobile.'' Since returning to Tucson, John McCain has met privately with the families of the victims, says Buchanan, and has been busy attending funerals.
